# Infra Helm + CI

## Values Overlays
- Dev: `helm upgrade --install myapp helm/chart -f helm/chart/values-dev.yaml`
- Prod: `helm upgrade --install myapp helm/chart -f helm/chart/values-prod.yaml`

## CI Preview/Prod
- Preview(PR): dry-run to preview namespace (see `infra-ci-env-matrix-preview-prod`)
- Prod(main): install/upgrade to prod namespace

## Cleanup
- Auto delete preview namespace on PR close (`infra-ci-preview-namespace-cleanup`)

## Tips
- Combine `-f` and `--set` to override
- Store secrets outside of values; refer via env/Secret
